text: Which of the following statement is/are true? (a) If A is a set and P (A) is infinite, then A must also be infinite. (b) For all sets A and B, if there is a surjection from A to B and A is countable, then B is countable (c) If R is a symmetric relation on the set A, then (A X A) â€” R must also be a symmetric relation on A. (d) For all sets A, B, and C, if ANBNC = @ then {A, B, C} is pairwise disjoint.
